Hi everyone, I fairly new to HubSpot and have been trying to figure out how to integrate Stripe costomer/data with existing HubSpot contact and associate deals (monthly recurring subscriptions) with them.

However I haven't found a way yet. I can create deals in HubSpot from New Plans in Stripe. I also can update contacts from lead to customer, both with the aid of Zapier.

However, I can't link the both together so that when ever an existing trial user upgrades to an plan, HubSpot creates a deal and associates that lead with the corresponding contact. I want to achieve this so that in HubSpot/Ads, I'll have an overview of how many deals and revenue I had in a specific timeframe and to understand from which campaign these deals came from.

I can do all this individually and or manually, but I wanted to know if there's a way to automize the whole process. Thank a lot!
Hey <@U03A4BZAE5R> with DepositFix you can connect deals and contacts based on subscription automatically <https://www.depositfix.com/lesson/creating-deals-automatically>
Hi Denis, thanks for the link! I'll check it out
